items.ch_text: 台南人，1989年出⽣。目前為互動工程師，暫時的⼈⽣目標是做新媒體藝術創作。
items.en_text: Born in Tainan, Taiwan, 1989. Now work as an interaction engineer, and temporarily devoted to new media art.

items.ch_text:
2013 臺大電機所CS組畢業
2011 臺⼤電機系畢業，雙主修數學系
items.en_text:
2013 Master of Science in Computer Science Group of Electrical Engineering, NTU
2011 Bachelor of Science in Engineering in Electrical Engineering and Bachelor of Science in Math, NTU

items.ch_text: 2013 第四屆台北數位藝術表演獎首獎 (與王連晟、周莉婷共同創作)
items.en_text: 2013 The 4th Taipei Digital Art Performance Award (with Lien-Cheng Wang, Adlian Chou)

items.ch_text:
2016 <抵抗焦慮的方式─ 皮皮大冒險> 聯展@水谷藝術
2012 <活大沙龍> 聯展@台大藝術季
2011 <安全出入口> 聯展@城中咖啡店
items.en_text:
2016 "Resistance of Anxiety- Adventures of Pipi" Joint Exhibition @Waley Art
2012 "NTU Art Festival" Joint Exhibition @NTU
2011 "Security Entrance/Exit" Joint Exhibition @UrbanCore Cafe

items.ch_text:
always: Processing, hand-drawing
sometimes: openFrameworks, arduino, html/js/css
